Wailing Winds

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Wailing Winds
The necromancer releases a wind of horrible screams and sighs. All enemies hearing the wailing will feel their spirits sink and have their hearts gripped with fear. The spell affects the whole battlefield until the battle is over or the caster is killed.
